title: How do I make a hex literal a decimal literal in Ghidra?
content: There are a few places where the decompiler displays a number as a hex literal when it's much clearer as a decimal literal. How do I change this?

answers_data.content:
Right click on the number

Convert -> Unsigned Decimal:

comments.text: This works in the disassembler output window ("Listing") but there's no "Convert" entry for numbers in the decompiler output window ("Decompile").
so true, I missed the "Decompile" word distinction in the question
interesting also change a number to a const/enum using Equate in the Listing window, it is not respected in the disassembly window. Sounds like a bug report should be opened.
Just checked and there's one already open: github.com/NationalSecurityAgency/ghidra/issues/21
This fixes the decompiler output nonetheless.
